name: Monster Catch
description:
Monster have invaded your family's cemetery! Use your quick wits to capture monsters in this casual entertaining drawing game. You have a limited amount of time and limited amount of line that you can use to capture monsters. When you capture a monster you receive extra time and line length that you can use to capture more monsters. How many monsters can you catch before your cemetery is overrun?

Features:
Endless Gameplay
Entertaining Drawing Game
4 Different Cute Monsters
Easy To Play Hard To Master
